abstract: Rashaad Newsome's mix of African-American culture and European tradition, aiming for a contemporary intersection of the classics and the street, is evident in his first solo show Herald at the Marlborough Gallery in Chelsea.
snippet: Rashaad Newsome’s mix of African-American culture and European tradition is aiming for a contemporary art bull’s-eye, the intersection of the classics and the street.
lead_paragraph: Rashaad Newsome’s mix of African-American culture and European tradition is aiming for a contemporary art bull’s-eye, the intersection of the classics and the street.

headline.seo: Rashaad Newsome, Blending Hip-Hop and Heraldry
